archdesc.scopecontent: Photographs and sound recordings of Alston remarks at the dedication of the Robert Hayden Lounge in the University of Michigan Center for Afroamerican and African Studies (1988) and interview conducted by William McAdoo (1900, includes transcript) relating to the Inventory of Negro Manuscripts project; also miscellanea.
